remarks: Inter-alia, to consider 1. Examine the status & decide on long term Fund Raising in single/multiple tranches of up to US$ 3 Billion under Reg-S/144A, through a public offer and/or private placement.
Inter alia, to seek approval for raising of Long-Term Bonds through a public issue or private placement of suitable tenor in compliance with SEBI guidelines, during the financial year 2024-25.
Inter alia, to consider and approve Prior intimation for meeting of the Executive Committee of the Central Board to seek approval for raising of Infrastructure Bonds.
Inter alia, To seek approval for raising of Infrastructure Bonds up to an amount of Rs. 10,000 crores (including a green shoe option of Rs. 5,000 crores) through a public issue or private placement.
